layout_path()

Returns the path to the layout template. The path is relative in relation to the app/views/ directory since Rails doesn’t support absolute paths to layout templates.

[Source]

    # File lib/selenium_on_rails/paths.rb, line 18
18:   def layout_path
19:     rails_root = Pathname.new File.expand_path(File.join(RAILS_ROOT, 'app/views'))
20:     view_path = Pathname.new view_path('layout')
21:     view_path.relative_path_from(rails_root).to_s
22:   end
